data.subject:

我真的很抱歉，都是我自己的错。

data.subject:

### （ 值得赞扬的是） , Jack never told anyone exactly what had happened. (credit n)
我们要求下次班会在星期五举行。
data.answer: We request that the next class meeting should be held on a Friday.
data.spell_word: We###request that###the next###class meeting###should###be held on###a Friday.
data.analysis: request that ... (should) do sth，request后的宾语从句中，谓语动词要用“should + 动词原形”，should可以省略
